name: KittyKeys
description:
Mic & Webcame Required, Best experienced with sound

Controls: pressing random keys on the keyboard, meowing in mic

Frantically smash the keyboard, meow for food, and stay alert to go up the kitty ranks in Kitty Keys!  Watch out for the kitty cam; it will take a screenshot during your loudest meow to use on your leaderboard.

Created with construct 2 at during the Global Game Jam 2014

Team:

  • Game Design & Programming: Alicia Fortier
  • Art: Zachary Soares
  • Music & Sound: Stéphane Fufa
